text: The men's 20 kilometres race walk event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, on 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Valeriy Borchin ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Andrey Krivov ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Sergey Bakulin ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
